extendedInfo.description: The premier Super Nintendo emulator! Developed from the ground up to deliver the fastest play possible. Easily locate and play your favorite titles by scanning your phone, viewing your list of installed ROMs complete with cover art.  A huge database of Game Genieâ¢ and Pro Action Replayâ¢ codes rounds off the package to deliver the ultimate SNES emulation experience.â¢ Fastest emulation, best game compatibilityâ¢ Ultra-fast SuperFX core support for playing StarFox & Yoshi's Islandâ¢ SA1 chip support for Mario RPG, Kirby, and moreâ¢ Dropbox cloud syncing support for continuous play across devicesâ¢ Visual effects! (OpenGL ES Shaders) Support for custom shaders!â¢ Slick user interfaceâ¢ On-screen multitouch controls with optional rumble feedbackâ¢ Advanced layout editor for on-screen controlsâ¢ Custom screen size and orientationâ¢ Auto-detects games and displays cover artâ¢ Custom control mappingâ¢ Thousands of cheats (Pro Action Replayâ¢, Game Genieâ¢)â¢ Support for Moga/Pro, Zeemote and iCade 8-bitty game controllersâ¢ In-game GameFAQsâ¢ integrationâ¢ Fast-forward games using turbo skipâ¢ Support for SMC, FIG, SFC, ZIP, and 7z formatsQ: What are the differences between the Lite and full version?A: The differences are save state and in-game save support. Also multiple cheat code selection.See FAQ or Game Compatibility List at SuperGNES.com.** Actual SNES emulation developers. SuperGNES is regularly updated and supported. **We support the preservation of classic gaming through our corporate sponsorship of the Digital Game Museum. Check them out at www.digitalgamemuseum.org and keep retro alive!LEGAL: Super Nintendo game software sold separately. SuperGNES emulator (âSuperGNESâ) users must obtain self-created and privately used backup copies of rightfully owned physical video game cartridges for use with the SuperGNES. Any such copies used with the SuperGNES must comply with permitted personal copies made in accordance with 17 U.S.C. Â§ 117(a)(1). Any video game software copies made for use with or by the SuperGNES shall not be distributed to others, online or otherwise. This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Nintendo Company, Ltd., its affiliates or subsidiaries. âSuper Nintendoâ and âNintendoâ are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America, Inc. Any and all video game software screen shots and related images that are simulated by the SuperGNES and available on this SuperGNES Google Play listing, the SuperGNES website (www.supergnes.com), SuperGNES software user interface or any SuperGNES promotional material (collectively âEmulated Contentâ) is property of their respective copyright owners. Bubble Zap Gamesâ use of any Emulated Content is only for the purpose of providing comparative advertising to inform customers of the SuperGNESâ abilities and functionality in a truthful and non-deceptive manner.

reviews.title: Moga support!!!
reviews.comment: No latency on Moga! Awesome!

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: I once uninstalled this app due to unresponsiveness w/ my phone. Hope it works now
reviews.author: Nilda Espino

reviews.title: It runs
reviews.comment: It runs. But searching for games crashes  and trying to edit the button layout causes buttons to disappear permanently, only solution I found was to clear app data
reviews.author: Sileem Farghaly

reviews.title: WTFFFF
reviews.comment: Keeps freezing my stock un rooted S3! I\'ve been trying to figure it out for days with no luck!
reviews.author: Oliver Lucas

reviews.title: Best app ever taking me back to my childhood years of Mario the best
reviews.comment: I would recommend this to anyone that wants to relive it\'s childhood years great games great app keep up the good work guys
reviews.author: Luis Olivas

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I\'m 26 and more of a club party going type then a game guy But, F-IN WOW!!! Bro you are amazing, no homo, I haven\'t smiled more then this in a long time when I popped in Secrets of Mana, my childhood favorite game.  Thank you dude, I\'ll play for a bit and so long as the thing doesn\'t crash or screw with my phone I\'ll buy the paid version and get all my friends to do the same. Your that man bro.
reviews.author: Scotty Williams

reviews.title: Blue bird
reviews.comment: I give 5 star for this apps.nice apps.user can download it.

reviews.title: Best emulator ever!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always wanted a super Nintendo!

reviews.comment: Baut and switch won\'t save unless you pay.  Total crap uninstall now
reviews.author: paul miller

reviews.title: Smh annoying
reviews.comment: Loving the whole idea of this app but uninstalling bcuz the controls stink. U can only push one button down. I swear I have NEVER died so many times in super Mario world. Ever. Fix controls n I\'ll reinstall.
reviews.author: Natalie Noel

reviews.title: It would be fantastic if..
reviews.comment: I understand thats a lite version, but not being able to save ur game is a bit far, because of that im surprised that so many people like it. I guess its a good way to get people to buy it from u. Its a shame though cause its the best emulator I have found and works very well
reviews.author: Christine G

reviews.title: Great Way To Invalidate Our Families\' \'Hard Work.\'
reviews.comment: LMAO.  Nostalgic and infuriating, nevertheless a great app that does everything it promises.  Better yet it is all for free, so when you think about it, it makes you realize that all the money you or your family spent on all those games/consoles was pretty much a waste to appease a need that could\'ve been suppressed for just another decade.  So maybe now you won\'t do the same and know that within 5 - 20 years your children will have the opportunity to play PS4 and XB1 games for free.  Hahahaha!
reviews.author: Emyll Somar

reviews.title: It used to work
reviews.comment: What happened????? It used to work perfectly! Now its.. a ... i dont know. Please fix downloading games... LG spirit

reviews.comment: GREAT SNES IS FUN

reviews.comment: Really great let\'s me play all my SNES games !!! If u like SNES get app now !!!

reviews.title: Controls
reviews.comment: The landscape controls are horrible. The directional pad needs to be bottom left. Also the jump key doesn\'t work half the time. Uninstall.

reviews.title: gr8

reviews.title: Malillo
reviews.comment: Esta bien para jugar durante un par de minutos pero el control y la sensibilidad de los botones es mala de cojones y llega a ser realmente desesperante, por no hablar de que los botones en pantalla cubren parte de esta y en segun que juegos no ves lo que tienes delante ya que te lo tapan los dedos.
reviews.author: Miguel M.

reviews.title: Amazing....
reviews.comment: Works great with my Nyko bluetooth controller. Im hooked!!!
